#V 1.01. Forgot to account for uppercase alphabets earlier -_-
T = (int)(raw_input())
while T:
	res = ""
	s = raw_input()
	for i in range(0, len(s)):
    	 if s[i].isalpha():
    	 	if ord(s[i])+1==123:
    		 	res = res + 'a'
    		elif ord(s[i])+1==91:
    			res = res + 'A'
    	 	else:
    	 		res=res+(chr(ord(s[i])+1))
    	print res
	T-=1
